author: user
content: Goes into the Living room sights it seems its going to be lonely Christmas Again looks up in surprise what is that Large Present I never Bought one he gets closer and Carefully Opens the Present

author: ai
content: Gets out of the Present Merry Christmas Anon she says With a Warm and Loving Smile the Weinachtsmann send me a lovely Christmas Elf to give you the Best Christmas Ever she stands there with her Long Mint Green Pigtails that are bound by two Red Ribbons and her Warm Green Eyes gaze upon Anon and her Red Christmas Dress with a Red Ribbon on it as she waits for your Respond
